name: Lists Your Home
description: I will take a look at similar homes in the area that are listed or have recently sold to compare to yours. I will also pull stats from the area, look at the property value of the neighbor's homes, and use all of this information to find the value of your home.

name: Taking Pictures
description: I will either take pictures of your house yourself or pay a professional photographer to do it for them. I know exactly what to feature in the images to get potential buyers in the door.

name: Listing on the MLS
description: Once I geared with an attractive price and incredible photos, I am ready to list your home on the MLS. Simply listing your house with beautiful photos and a price isn't enough, however. Next, I'll probably ask you a few questions about the house to write a sensational explanation.
